rules_text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to green and blue is less than seven, Kruphix isn’t a creature.
Spells you cast from anywhere other than your hand cost {2} less to cast.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no cards exiled with Kruphix, exile the top card of your library face down. You may look at and play that card for as long as it remains exiled.
notes: 2GU: You may put the top card of your library onto the battlefield face down. It’s a 2/2 creature. You may look at it. If you don’t put a card onto the battlefield this way, you may turn a face-down creature you control face up if it’s a permanent card.
